name: USPS Shipping for WooCommerce ‚Äì Live Rates
author: theDotstore

sections.description:
üëâ Allow customers to display the USPS live rates

üëâ Without wasting your time, enter your USPS account and store postcode, and set everything up in your shop effortlessly in just 2 minutes!

üëâ Once the USPS account is established, the shipping cost for each USPS service is calculated in real-time based on the products‚Äô weight, shop location, and delivery destination.

This plugin allows the store owners to choose specific available shipping services to enable like Domestic or International.

Adjust the dynamic shipping rates based on store owner’s custom duties, allowing to add extra shipping changes by flat or percentage on Live USPS shipping rates.

üíÅ Key benefits of Advanced USPS Shipping

üîë Support Domestic and international USPS services to enable.
üîë Dedicated debug mode for easy troubleshooting
üîë Default shipping rates for the outage shipping area
üîë Automatic shipping costs calculation based on cart weight and the shipping destination.

Plugin – VIEW LIVE DEMO

Free plugin: Need Technical Help? – Click here

Pro Plugin: PRE-SALE Questions – Click here or Review Help Document

Key features of Advanced USPS Shipping – Free Version

  • Show USPS shipping method on cart/checkout page
  • show API response on checkout process for developer
  • Configure the default shipping rates
  • Add the postcode of your warehouse/store, from where the item to ship

üëâ Difference Between Lite and Pro Version

Check the detailed difference between the Pro and Lite – Click here

üíÅ Contact Us or Submit Support Ticket

  • Free plugin: Need Technical Help? – Click here
  • Pro Plugin: PRE-SALE Questions – Click here or Help Document

EXPLORE OUR OTHER PLUGINS TO SUPERCHARGE YOUR WEBSITE:

  1. Flat-rate shipping plugins for WooCommerce
  2. WooCommerce Extra Fees Plugin
  3. Advanced Product Size Charts For WooCommerce
  4. Hide Shipping Method For WooCommerce

  6. Blocker ‚Äì Prevent Fake Orders And Blacklist Fraud Customers

  11. Conditional Discount Rules For WooCommerce Checkout
  12. WooCommerce Checkout For Digital Goods
  13. Advance Menu Manager For WordPress

üëâ Some of our other free WooCommerce plugins:

  1. Shipping Method Display Style for WooCommerce
  2. Minimum and Maximum Quantity for WooCommerce
  3. Multicollab ‚Äì Google Doc-Style Editorial Commenting for WordPress
  4. Multipurpose Gutenberg Block
sections.installation:
1. Upload advanced-usps-shipping-method.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configured plugin settings as per step defined in getting started page.
sections.faq:
Q. How I configure the USPS services?

ANS: To configure the USPS services, you required USPS account ID that needs to add for the connection.

Q. What’s debug mode in configuration page?

ANS: Debug mode will show request and response from USPS API. This option will only for developer use only.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • [Enhancement] Plugin UI enhancement
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 8.8.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.5.x

1.0.3

  • [Enhancement] Plugin compatibility with PHP 8.2.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 8.7.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.5.x

1.0.2

  • [Enhancement] Quick fix related to the Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 7.9.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.2.x

1.0.1

  • Enhancement ‚Äì Improvise plugin layout and design
  • Enhancement ‚Äì Plugin compatibility with PHP-8
  • Fixed ‚Äì Minor bug fixes related to the string translation
  • Update ‚Äì Compatible with WooCommerce 7.0.x
  • Update ‚Äì Compatible with WordPress 6.0.x

1.0.0

  • Debug log functionality
  • Show the cheapest rate from USPS
  • Compatible with WordPress 5.9.x
  • Compatible with WooCommerce 6.3.x
